entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , North Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:26 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 06:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -3.0°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 55 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -10.8°C
Wind: E 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. Forecast issued 06:29 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 06:29 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:29 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
